page.title: 01 GAZETTEER
page.content: Our block is largely agricultural land growing corn,oil seed rape and pasture grass for animals,with the village of Sedgeberrow in its midst.Sedgeberrow has a population of approx 600 people.There are two shops,a Post Office, church, pub,garage and a school where the hall is used for community activities in the evenings.There are 3 wholesale vegetable growers,a small fruit and vegetable distributer and an agricultural haulage firm in our area. Some houses are used as holiday homes in the summer months.The majority of homes have been built in the 20th Century.There is a Georgian period house which is now used as a residential rest home. Within our block is the river Isbourne which is noted for being the only river in Europe to flow North.
